title: Tuskegee Institute National Historic Site: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility       Our goal is to make the Tuskegee Institute National Historic Site (TUIN) facilities and programs accessible to all visitors.  Interpretive programs are offered throughout the year, and Park Rangers make every effort to accommodate all visitors at these programs.  Click the links below for information that will assist visitors with special needs.    Limited Mobility Hearing Impaired Limited Vision
